name: pocket map
description:
"As you walk, new places spring up like plants between fingers of pavement. You plant your fingers in your pockets and catalogue what makes up the soil."

pocket map is a bitsy game about not knowing how to drive, making friends with weeds and learning how to ask for space 

this game was first published in Cordite Poetry Review, GAME Issue: http://cordite.org.au/poetry/game/pocket-map/
